sentences.sContent: The grass grew thick and velvety.
sentences.sCn: 草长得又茂密又柔软光滑。

synos.tran: 天鹅绒般柔软的；醇和的，可口的

words.tran: 天鹅绒，丝绒；天鹅绒似的东西

trans.tranCn: 天鹅绒般柔软的；醇和的，可口的
trans.tranOther: If you describe something as velvety, you mean that it is pleasantly soft to touch and has the appearance or quality of velvet
